definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to come down in the world (idiom)/to suffer a reversal of fortune

sentences.english: He is the son of a wealthy family, but he seems to have come down in the globe.
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人家的儿子，不过看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of the rich man , However look that the family financial situation was worsening .
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人的儿子，不过看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of a richman, but his family seems not doing well recently.
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人的儿子，不过看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: He was the son of a wealthy man, but the family looks declining.
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人家的儿子，看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is a son from a wealthy family. But it looks like his family's glory is fading away.
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人家的儿子，不过看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: He is the son of a wealthy family, but he seems to have come down in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他是个富人家的儿子，不过看上去已经家道中落了。

sentences.english: Some hide fears of financial ruin.
sentences.chinese: 有些隐匿着家道没落的恐惧。

definition: to come down in the world (idiom)/to suffer a reversal of fortune
(of status or wealth) to decline/(of buildings etc) to become dilapidated/run-down/(of plants) to wilt
preparatory literary studies for imperial examination
number of people in a family/population/(old) adult males/male servants
rich and powerful/rich and influential person/big shot
